title: IEdgeFlangeFeatureData.ReliefDepth
description: Gets or sets the relief depth of the edge flange.
returns: Depth of relief; default value is 0.0003683 m
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::UseDefaultBendRelief
is set to false,
- and -
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::UseReliefRatio
is true.
- and -
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::AutoReliefType
is set to
swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e
.:
swSheetMetalReliefObround
- or -
swSheetMetalReliefRectangle.
